description:
Long Haul Management is one of the top, most respected and experienced talent management companies with a focus on representing the top digital sports, gaming and lifestyle creators.

We’re looking for a Sales-minded professional with 5+ years experience to bring our clients’ current brand partnerships to the next level. Your primary focus will be to engage with brands and agencies to identify and create new opportunities and drive revenue growth. The successful candidate will have a proven track-record in building effective partnerships, as well as an established reputation for driving commercial success through multi-property and multi-platform businesses.

EEO Statement: Long Haul Management is an equal opportunity employer. We celebrate diversity and are committed to creating an inclusive environment for all employees.

INDIVIDUAL DUTIES WILL INCLUDE
• Manage brand partnerships for assigned Long Haul clients through prospecting, pitching, negotiating and closing new brand partners
• Assist creators with identifying and enhancing non-traditional revenue streams that lead to new monetizable commercial assets
• Coordinate directly with brands and/or agencies to cultivate relationships and build customized solutions and pitches
• Build and maintain a constant pipeline of prospective clients, agencies and key industry drivers
• Work with the internal campaign management team to help ensure availability and client success on upcoming potential opportunities
• Be an advocate and partner as needed to our talent internally and externally, working to support and assist them on their journey as content creators with strategy recommendations, resource identification, ad-hoc requests, etc.

WE’RE INTERESTED IN CANDIDATES WHO HAVE
• Minimum of 4 years’ selling brand deals or sponsorships in the sport, gaming, consumer goods or media verticals
• Bachelor’s Degree required
• Possess strong solution-based selling skills and has experience working with brands, marketing agencies and media buyers
• Knowledge of the sports and entertainment sponsorship industry, including but not limited to market trends, innovative activation and executional strategies
• Determined work ethic with a passion for delivering on group and individual objectives
• Strong negotiation, relationship-building and interpersonal skills
• Proven track record of securing renewal and upsells of partnerships
• Ability to identify prospect’s needs, and pair with or build creative solutions to drive value for property and brand
• Highly organized, with excellent written, verbal and presentation skills
• Candidate must be willing to travel, work evenings, weekends, and holidays as required

Why You’ll Love Long Haul Management
• You will play a key role in defining the future of Long Haul Management and will be depended upon to ensure the success of the company and the talent we represent.
• The talent you work with and promote engages with millions of fans on a frequent basis.
• You will be relied upon every day for talent and brand needs, and will work with our Management team to define and support our future strategy.
• You will get exposure to all aspects of our business, including marketing, legal, content, sales, partnerships, merch, and more.
• No day is the same and that’s part of the fun.
• We treat employees as adults and try to be flexible to each individual's needs as we trust them to properly handle their responsibilities.

Details & Benefits:
• Remote work with flexible hours
• Competitive salary
• Unlimited vacation days
• Generous health insurance, dental and vision coverage
• Life insurance and Long-term disability coverage after 3 months
• 401k Profit Sharing Plan and/or Defined Benefit Pension Plan after 1 year of service
• Cell phone and internet monthly stipend
